STOP  THE WELFARE CARD  IT'S NOT BEEN THOUGHT THROUGH
IF PEOPLE ARE TOLD WHAT TO SPEND THEIR MONEY ON THEN THIS COUNTRY IS NO LONGER A FREE COUNTRY BUT THE BEGINNING OF A COMMUNISM ISN'T THERE ENOUGH POOR PEOPLE
SINCE THE TORYS TOOK POWER BEFORE THEY START MESSING WITH PEOPLE THEY SHOULD LIVE LIKE ONE FOR AT LEAST 6 MONTHS THEN LET THEM SEE HOW DIFFICULT IT IS NOT EVERY ONE SITS ON BENEFITS DRINKING SMOKING AND GAMBLING JUST LIKE NOT EVERY TORY WAS BORN WITH A SILVER SPOON IN THEIR MOUTHS !!
